evidence.claim: Wolkvox uses AWS for their cloud services infrastructure.
The company supports FHIR standard for healthcare data exchange.
Wolkvox mentions AWS Lambda in their developer documentation.
They utilize SOAP and REST APIs for integration with EHR systems.
References to HL7 compliance can be found in their security documentation.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of handling X12 transactions or clearinghouse functionalities.
